collection.sentence:
Introduction This Privacy Policy outlines the
personal information that Pannous GmbH ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses,
and shares when you use our Custom GPT Plugin.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Information We Collect a. User-Provided Information: This includes information
that you provide directly when you use our plugin, such as text inputs,
configuration settings, and any other data entry.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Automated Information:
When you interact with our plugin, we may automatically collect information
about your device, interaction with our plugin, and usage patterns.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Data Retention We retain personal
information we collect from you where we have an ongoing legitimate business
need to do so.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Data Security We implement appropriate technical and
organizational measures to protect the personal information that we collect
and process.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
The right to complain to a data protection authority about our
collection and use of your personal information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We do not knowingly
collect personal information from children under 16.
